body_html:
@bddppq
The motivation here is to reduce the back-and-forth between the pytorch repo and gloo submodule to speed up the development. Note that I have included some pre-hipified gloo headers in the PR (I am more inclined to upstream gloo rather than hipifying gloo caffe2 submodule).

The motivation here is to reduce the back-and-forth between the pytorch repo and gloo submodule to speed up the development. Note that I have included some pre-hipified gloo headers in the PR (I am more inclined to upstream gloo rather than hipifying gloo caffe2 submodule).
body:
@bddppq 
The motivation here is to reduce the back-and-forth between the pytorch repo and gloo submodule to speed up the development. Note that I have included some pre-hipified gloo headers in the PR (I am more inclined to upstream gloo rather than hipifying gloo caffe2 submodule).
